item.title: Sqr and SqrT
item.dc:creator: @koffe koffe
item.description:
@koffe wrote:

Lol, was bored so… Dunno if its right:P but I think it is
[scar]program New;

function Square(int : integer) : integer;
var i : integer;
begin
for i := 0 to int do
begin
if (i*i = int) then
result := i;
end;
if result = 0 then
writeln(’[Error] Invalid number’);
end;

function SquareT(a,b : integer) : extended;
var a2,b2,c : extended;
begin
a2 := a * a;
b2 := b * b;
c := a2 + b2;
Result := Sqrt©;
end;

begin
writeln(inttostr(Square(9)));
writeln(FloatToStr(squareT(8,6)));
end.[/scar]
hehe:P
